name: Crushing Blow
text: Your focus allows you to smash your enemy’s defenses.
benefit: You can make a Stunning Fist attempt as a full-round action. If successful, instead of stunning your target, you reduce the target’s AC by an amount equal to your Wisdom modifier for 1 minute. This penalty does not stack with other penalties applied due to Crushing Blow.
staminaText: When using this feat, you can spend either 2 or 4 stamina points. If you do, the Crushing Blow attack reduces the target’s AC by an additional 1 for every 2 stamina points you spent.
text_zh: 你专注于如何粉碎敌人的防御。
benefit_zh: 你可以用一个整轮动作来施放一次震慑拳。如果成功，你将不会震慑目标，而是降低其AC，数值为你的感知修正，持续1分钟。该罚值不会与另一次本专长造成的罚值叠加。
staminaText_zh: 使用怒涛碎击时可选择花费2或4点耐力，令导致的AC惩罚提升1或2点。
